arStrings.szText: {c_highlight}Lunar Shrines{/c} surging with an immense and prosperous power are appearing throughout Sanctuary.
Defeat monsters while empowered by Lunar Shrines to earn {c_highlight}50% bonus Experience{/c} and unlock {c_highlight}limited-time rewards{/c} from {c_highlight}Ying-Yue{/c}.
{c_highlight}Protect Lunar Celebrants{/c} and {c_highlight}cleanse Lunar Shrines{/c} from miserly spirits to accelerate your favor with the ancestors.
Nightmare Dungeon Sigils have a chance to grant the {c_highlight}Ancestors' Favor Dungeon Affix{/c}, yielding {c_highlight}extra Lunar Shrines{/c} and {c_highlight}10% bonus Glyph Experience{/c}.
